s.text: I'm not fond of cats in general, but I feel a bond with this one--he's very smart and well behaved--and I certainly feel he's better off in my care.
I'm not fond of cats in general, but I feel a bond with this one--he's very smart and well behaved--and I certainly feel he's better off in my care.
Who knows, the owner might have had children who needed shoes (though since the owner was in Europe, I doubt it).
Who knows, the owner might have had children who needed shoes (though since the owner was in Europe, I doubt it).
From the time our cat Chappaquiddick (don't ask) was 19 until she died at 20 or 21, we took her to the vet twice a week for dialysis.
